Tesler continues to lose sales and market share in the US. Market share dropped two and a half points in 2025 to 46.2%. Not Tesler sales grew by 2.8% while Tesler sales slipped by 7.0%. Expect these trends will continue in 2026 as the US market remains challenging for EV car makers.
